resources.string: Oops! There is no active Internet Connection\nPlease try again

JMTask is a free movie app that allows you to search for movies, view their details, and add them to your watchlist. The app has a simple and intuitive interface, making it easy to find the movies you're looking for.

JMTask is a great way to find new movies to watch. It's free to use and available on Android devices.

The app is built using Kotlin + XML, using MVVM Architecture!
